history: On April 8, 1917, Canadian troops launched the Battle of Vimy Ridge—a moment of national unity and pride.
birthday: Rex Murphy (1947), political commentator known for his sharp Canadian voice.
energy: Still as lakewater. Strong as northern wind. Rooted like pine.

product.name: Deep North Black Hoodie
product.description: Made for days when you don’t raise your voice—but everyone listens.
